summary: Have you ever wanted to use the weapon those Giants have? or simply want to throw a target or two into thin air?  well now you can.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700]Get the weapon from any giant. the one the companions killed outside whiterun should have it as well. emphasis on "should".

[/color]two version of the mod:
Hammer time and normal.

Hammertime has an enchant : To throw targets in air. (not like how the real giants do, you are human after all.) (or khajit)... you get the point.
Normal has no enchant : you can put whatever enchantment you want with this version. 

*KNOWN BUGS:
Weapon's damage is increase by "increase one-hand damage" (enchant, potion,) but using the weapon increases your two hand perk level. this is due to the fact that giant themselves use the weapon as a one-handed type, whereas i, created the mod to be a two-handed SWORD.

This mod is abandoned but still *WORKING.

alright, talos guide you.
author: kaps66
